businessProfile.name: Massimos Pizza and Pasta
businessProfile.address: 369 E 17th St #15, Costa Mesa, CA 92627, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 369 E 17th St #15, Costa Mesa, CA 92627, USA

reviews.text: The brothers who won Massimo‚Äôs pizza took over the joint from their dad. You will instantly tell that they are dedicated. They get along well together and they pump out tremendously phenomenal pizza and sandwiches. We‚Äôve been there hundreds of times over the last two decades. Awesome menu and the food gets better every time we visit.

We usually order takeout.
The food is amazing! My fave is Rigatoni with pink sauce, sometimes with the homemade meatballs. Two boys  love their pizza and One gets the spaghetti with Meatballs.
Can‚Äôt forget the CHEESE BREAD ü•ñ
The service and delivery is on time and is no hassle. Great management and customer service.
Seems like they run a tight ship!

A Utah couple and a Nevada family go out for pizza! It was wonderful!!
We had the XL pizza special and ate way too much!  The young ones had pasta dishes and loved them as well. Thank you for making such delicious food fun!!

One of the best hidden gems (not to locals)!!! The food is sooooo tasty & prices are very reasonable especially for what you get. The staff are extremely passionate about their community & take pride in every customer that walks through their door. You just become family feeling. Customers socialize with each other. Absolutely recommend!!!

Family owned and Solid food. Seriously best pizza in town. Love their pink sauce and greek salad! Our family comes here at least once a week. Great place for kids. Service is always outstanding and we always feel at home.

editorial_summary.overview: Basic Italian spot offering pies, pasta dishes & daily dinner specials in a shopping-center setting.

recentReviews.text:
This places integrates ingredients flawlessly for a delicious pizza every time, and their customer service is top notch.

I just discovered this place a couple months back and couldn't be more pleased. If you go inside, all the staff members are genuine, kind, and professional; they give the feeling that they love what they do, and you can taste it in the pizza. For delivery, orders arrive on time, with every pizza cooked to crisp - crust perfection. And they have beef pepperoni!

The one time they got my order wrong, I called in, and the staff recognized the error and sent me a pizza (the correct order) on the house.

Brilliant!
Best pizza we had in Southern California, service is always on above and beyond. Don‚Äôt hesitate to visit or order.

One of the best hidden gems (not to locals)!!! The food is sooooo tasty & prices are very reasonable especially for what you get. The staff are extremely passionate about their community & take pride in every customer that walks through their door. You just become family feeling. Customers socialize with each other. Absolutely recommend!!!

The brothers who won Massimo‚Äôs pizza took over the joint from their dad. You will instantly tell that they are dedicated. They get along well together and they pump out tremendously phenomenal pizza and sandwiches. We‚Äôve been there hundreds of times over the last two decades. Awesome menu and the food gets better every time we visit.
Great family owned business with phenomenal service, food, and atmosphere. The pizza is delicious and served in a timely manner. 5 stars
Massimo‚Äôs is awesome‚Äî great pizza, great pasta and sandwiches and salads, all at reasonable prices.

detailedReviews.author: Martell Scott
detailedReviews.text:
This places integrates ingredients flawlessly for a delicious pizza every time, and their customer service is top notch.

I just discovered this place a couple months back and couldn't be more pleased. If you go inside, all the staff members are genuine, kind, and professional; they give the feeling that they love what they do, and you can taste it in the pizza. For delivery, orders arrive on time, with every pizza cooked to crisp - crust perfection. And they have beef pepperoni!

The one time they got my order wrong, I called in, and the staff recognized the error and sent me a pizza (the correct order) on the house.

Brilliant!

detailedReviews.author: Roman Gonzalez
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza we had in Southern California, service is always on above and beyond. Don‚Äôt hesitate to visit or order.

detailedReviews.author: Invisible Citizen
detailedReviews.text: One of the best hidden gems (not to locals)!!! The food is sooooo tasty & prices are very reasonable especially for what you get. The staff are extremely passionate about their community & take pride in every customer that walks through their door. You just become family feeling. Customers socialize with each other. Absolutely recommend!!!

detailedReviews.author: Sebastian Ragazzo
detailedReviews.text: The brothers who won Massimo‚Äôs pizza took over the joint from their dad. You will instantly tell that they are dedicated. They get along well together and they pump out tremendously phenomenal pizza and sandwiches. We‚Äôve been there hundreds of times over the last two decades. Awesome menu and the food gets better every time we visit.

detailedReviews.author: Alex Rodriguez
detailedReviews.text: Great family owned business with phenomenal service, food, and atmosphere. The pizza is delicious and served in a timely manner. 5 stars

detailedReviews.author: Carrie Olson
detailedReviews.text: Great food.

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Keefer
detailedReviews.text: Massimo‚Äôs is awesome‚Äî great pizza, great pasta and sandwiches and salads, all at reasonable prices.

detailedReviews.author: Debbie Kerwin
detailedReviews.text: This is the best pizza/salad/sandwich place in Costa Mesa.  We have been going there for 44 years and it never disappoints. Great staff always friendly and fabulous food. What more could you want.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel
detailedReviews.text: The people are great and the food is consistently good.  They have been around a long time and haven‚Äôt lost their touch.

detailedReviews.author: Erica McClelland
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic service. Friendly owner. Awesome food & great prices.

detailedReviews.author: christin maiers
detailedReviews.text:
Ok, I love pizza. I do. I could eat it daily. We will be in Costa Mesa for 12 days and I had to have some. MASSIMOS.... ahhhh! MASSIMOS!!! How we found you, I dont know, but I'm dang glad we did!
We swung in and had a pie with the kids. It was 32 bucks. All 4 of us left full! The place was perfect pizza shop-just a nice chill place to eat.
Last night (I said I love pizza) we were starving and so we did a pick up order. 2 pizzas (one for the kid to take to the dorm) and it was just as good.
The sauce is FLAVORFUL! The dough is perfect crusty but chewy but flavorful too! You dont skimp in the toppings and the people!!
You guys are just so nice!!! We have a term back home - Iowa Nice!
You guys are putting Iowa Nice to shame with how cool you are.
Thank you, thank you!

detailedReviews.author: Latisha A.
detailedReviews.text: The best for over 40 years glad we found this Gem

detailedReviews.author: Janine Wertheim
detailedReviews.text: DO NOT order online.  They put outrageous mark ups on their prices.  For instance the lasagna was marked up by $7.25 and the Pizza was more than $7 more.  Same for the salads.  The food was good especially the lasagna but pizza was really greasy.

detailedReviews.author: Ann Kaiser
detailedReviews.text:
We usually order takeout.
The food is amazing! My fave is Rigatoni with pink sauce, sometimes with the homemade meatballs. Two boys  love their pizza and One gets the spaghetti with Meatballs.
Can‚Äôt forget the CHEESE BREAD ü•ñ
The service and delivery is on time and is no hassle. Great management and customer service.
Seems like they run a tight ship!

detailedReviews.author: Mike Hall
detailedReviews.text: I've been coming here for 11 years and everything is always perfect. Love this place and the team.

detailedReviews.author: Molly Calder
detailedReviews.text: Been going to Massimo‚Äôs for many years. Love the app it‚Äôs so simple to use and my food is always ready when I get there to pick it up.

detailedReviews.author: Jean Bennett
detailedReviews.text: Employees always so friendly and we love the pizza! ü•∞

detailedReviews.author: Adrian preston
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was amazing . The sauce and crust were on point.  Cooked to perfection. Very good quality cheese

detailedReviews.author: Jason Thomas
detailedReviews.text: Awesome as always!

detailedReviews.author: asia moore
detailedReviews.text: Meatball sub was amazing

detailedReviews.author: Krupa Padia
detailedReviews.text: Family owned and Solid food. Seriously best pizza in town. Love their pink sauce and greek salad! Our family comes here at least once a week. Great place for kids. Service is always outstanding and we always feel at home.

detailedReviews.author: Robyn Johnson
detailedReviews.text:
A Utah couple and a Nevada family go out for pizza! It was wonderful!!
We had the XL pizza special and ate way too much!  The young ones had pasta dishes and loved them as well. Thank you for making such delicious food fun!!

detailedReviews.author: Wally Majewski
detailedReviews.text: You guys make great pizza super fresh and filling

detailedReviews.author: Danielle Mulvey
detailedReviews.text: Great local pizza place. Always easy, nice, hospitable and delicious when you are craving quick pizza and pasta.

detailedReviews.author: Hamza Awad
detailedReviews.text: Great tasting food, and extremely courteous staff. Assured us that halal options were available and gave menu recommendations. Would come again

detailedReviews.author: cliff thorpe
detailedReviews.text: Family owned for over 50 years and the pride in the experience shows.  Wonderful pizza and everything I saw looked amazing.  I took my pizza out but enjoyed a craft beer on tap while I waited.  Gems like Massimo‚Äôs are hard to find.

detailedReviews.author: Alex Xagorarakis
detailedReviews.text: My family's go-to for pizza üçï and large menu of tasty Italian food. Beer on tap and other drinks! Cool place to hang out with the family and friends. Good sports on the TVs and lower volume so people can talk. I've been going here since I was a kid and the family owned business continues to deliver awesome food

detailedReviews.author: T G
detailedReviews.text:
Absolutely incredible service and food!
Wood highly highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Janie Sanson
detailedReviews.text: Good food+good service =GREAT  ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Swedlow
detailedReviews.text: The food is delicious and the service was amazing!

detailedReviews.author: BeB√©
detailedReviews.text: The food is delicious and the staff is awesome.  There are so many great options on the menu.  My go-to choices are definitely the pizza, salads and pastas.

detailedReviews.author: Christine McNaught
detailedReviews.text: This is our favorite Italian goto when we host our friends.

detailedReviews.author: Paige Sparks
detailedReviews.text: If you haven‚Äôt eaten at Massimos, you‚Äôre missing out. My husband orders for us and they know him by name, and honestly, we are a little picky about our pizza and this place is our absolute, hands down, favorite place. The dough is so fluffy and delicious, the sauce is always on point, and the pizzas are always well made. Also the people who work there are always flying around, busting their butts, and making it happen! You guys rock and we love yall!

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Andrews
detailedReviews.text: Ordered take out online. Easy ordering,  Order ready when promised. Very easy pickup. For was tasty and large portions. We‚Äôll be back.

detailedReviews.author: Morgan Serrano
detailedReviews.text: Our favorite local pizza spot! Anything you get here is delicious, just had their meat lasagna tonight and it was exactly what I was looking for! Their staff is always very warm and welcoming, plus the food comes out pretty quickly. Continues to be a staple for us.

detailedReviews.author: Joe Patch
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and a awesome meatball sandwich.  I go here way to much.

detailedReviews.author: chris roselli
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been coming here for over 20 years and the food is so damn consistent and you always know what you‚Äôre gonna get. It‚Äôs a family environment and it‚Äôs run by generations of the same family. Gotta love that.

detailedReviews.author: Jasmine M
detailedReviews.text: Their pizza is amazing, I recommend getting single slices or a large though, the small and mediums don't taste nearly as great. They have an awesome lunch dead from 1-3 on weekdays too, only $8 for 2 (cheese) slices of pizza and a drink (in this economy?!) I tried the meatball sub, and it was alright, I recommend the pizza instead though. They also have pretty good salad.

detailedReviews.author: Heather Anda Burggren
detailedReviews.text: Theeeeee very best üëå

detailedReviews.author: Omar Oue
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great people and great atmosphere! For Muslims they have Halal options which is very rare in Costa Mesa. Definitely recommend it. üòÅüèÖ

detailedReviews.author: jeffrey Hinshaw
detailedReviews.text: Mafia Sandwich!

detailedReviews.author: Leigh Eddy
detailedReviews.text: My go to for years, and now my come back when I'm in town.

detailedReviews.author: Adrian Nsk
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was good but a medium regular pizza was $28 dollars whereas the site advertises as $10-20 for an order. It is too much to pay $30 for a pizza

detailedReviews.author: Suz Busby
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm from out of town. I‚Äôm an older gal. I just tripped upon this place and it is a 10. The food is outstanding. The service is outstanding. It‚Äôs cozy. It‚Äôs comfortable high-quality food, warm atmosphere ,and I had the pasta, to die for.

detailedReviews.author: Mrinalini Mishra
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely loved the spinach ricotta pasta with alfredo sauce. Tried the specialty vegetarian pizza, it was perfectly cooked and tasty. Will be coming back.

detailedReviews.author: ERICA JACOBSON
detailedReviews.text:
This Pizza is really great.  The crust is delicious.
Also tried the lasagna.

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Krumenaker
detailedReviews.text: Hands down I love this pizza. I‚Äôm from New Jersey and this is my go to because it reminds me of home. I love it so much that for my birthday I had a pizza theme ( I turned 35) and we ordered all the different pizza toppings . Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Reddick
detailedReviews.text:
When your half your group is in dire need of pizza and the other is after Pasta the crew here really does that well.
Will be back again for more 'create your own pasta options' is the 'all beef' meatball recipe, marinara sauce is crafty, and the pesto sauce is incredible.

detailedReviews.author: Marlo Serrato
detailedReviews.text: Googled good pizza after being at Newport beach , glad I picked Massimos we ordered a spaghetti w/ meat sauce the portion was generous and one of the best spaghetti Ive ever had , we also got a pepperoni and sausage pizza it was quality very tasty crust was so good too our food was very fresh n hot the service is friendly good vibe thumbs up üëç

detailedReviews.author: Alaka Ray
detailedReviews.text: We ordered pizza & felt like we are eating normal store bread with toppings not even diced properly. Tomatoes were diced like we dice for curry.. if only I could give no stars for taste

detailedReviews.author: Danny & Freddy Carr
detailedReviews.text: Always good, never disappoints.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Boyack
detailedReviews.text: Good stuff.

detailedReviews.author: Russell Reynen
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I have found in Costa Mesa!

detailedReviews.author: Ehsan Tavakkol
detailedReviews.text: Excellent

detailedReviews.author: Radmir Muftakhin
detailedReviews.text: An incredibly cool place with an awesome vibe, delicious halal meat, and excellent service. Always a pleasure to visit.

detailedReviews.author: Connor Lambert
detailedReviews.text: Pizza here is fire!!! Especially when Benjamin makes it

detailedReviews.author: Shelly beck
detailedReviews.text: Massimo used to be our  favorite. This pizza taste like cheap  garlic salt. It's so gross.

detailedReviews.author: Stefania Barr
detailedReviews.text: I hate to leave such a negative review, but this was a massive disappointment. For a 4.8 star rated spot? Expectations were so much higher. Perhaps quality has gone downhill? The crust was bland and flavorless, sauce/ingredient ratios were all off, the veggie pizza was undercooked and soggy, the cheese had no particular flavor, the chicken BBQ was drowning in sauce (not in a good way)‚Ä¶ extremely average. Especially for the price point. Bummer!

detailedReviews.author: khaled salem
detailedReviews.text: best customer service restaurant in so cal .

detailedReviews.author: Darlene Jaeger
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza,  yummy üòã

detailedReviews.author: Sly 1
detailedReviews.text: The guy behind the counter was not o ly nice  ut very cute...lol. got the chicken fettuccine and small Massimos pizza...o e word....YUMMY!

detailedReviews.author: Pilar Cayton
detailedReviews.text:
Great food, great service, good atmosphere
The sandwiches are amazing - my husband loves the Italian sub - perfectly balanced meats & veggies, with just the right amount of juice - no soggy bread here!
Bolognese spaghetti is great too - add meatballs or sausage and you're set!

detailedReviews.author: Helen Miller
detailedReviews.text: üçïüçùü§åüèº

detailedReviews.author: Joey Garcia
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great service, and chill vibes. Plenty of options for kids and tasty beers on tap.

detailedReviews.author: Stefano Chiussi
detailedReviews.text: As an Italian I can say that the 2 pastas (pesto and alfredo) we tried was really super! Staff was friendly and rapid, all customers seemed to be happy and satisfied. This is the place to be in Newport Beach for Italian food lovers!

detailedReviews.author: Adriana Kinney
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely the best pizza and favorite place to order from. The flavors, the freshness, the smokey crust, yum! And of course the people are amazing, too. I've always received super hot pizza, the delivery has always been very fast. All of this brings me back home and it's an amazing experience!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the genuine, kind, and professional staff who create a family-like atmosphere and make every visit feel special. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The pizza is celebrated for its perfect crust, flavorful sauce, and generous toppings, consistently delivering a delicious experience. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
Timely delivery and excellent customer service, even correcting mistakes with complimentary orders, are highly valued by customers. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Price discrepancies between online orders and advertised prices - review management can address this concern
Negative feedback on pizza quality and taste - review management can address this concern
Perception of declining quality despite high ratings - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Martell Scott
positive.text:
This places integrates ingredients flawlessly for a delicious pizza every time, and their customer service is top notch.

I just discovered this place a couple months back and couldn't be more pleased. If you go inside, all the staff members are genuine, kind, and professional; they give the feeling that they love what they do, and you can taste it in the pizza. For delivery, orders arrive on time, with every pizza cooked to crisp - crust perfection. And they have beef pepperoni!

The one time they got my order wrong, I called in, and the staff recognized the error and sent me a pizza (the correct order) on the house.

Brilliant!
